title: Bug 4329: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results are displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: The Search dialog in the package view is initialized with a fully qualified name, which prevents finding declarations. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works.
EB: When searching in Java using the Package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the search dialog.
4. Perform a search for declarations.

Expected result: Declarations should be found and displayed.

Notes:
